translation.en: -[player 1] Keep the pack together! -[players yelling]
translation.it: che ne hanno inventato le regole. Restate compatti!

translation.en: [player 1] Come on, Arthur!
[player 2] Drive it forwards.
[player 3] Well played, Arthur.
-[boy 1] Here he comes! -[boy 2] Are you sure it's him?
[reporter] Mr. Kinnaird, will the Old Etonians take the FA Cup this year?
translation.it: Sig. Kinnaird, gli Old Etonians vinceranno quest'anno?

translation.en: [boy 1] Can we have an autograph?
What of your quarter-final opponents, Darwen FC?
translation.it: Che mi dice dell'avversario ai quarti di finale, il Darwen?

translation.en: What do you think? Can they stop me winning another Cup?
translation.it: Voi che dite? Mi impediranno di vincere?

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no! Not at all, sir! -[boy 1] Never!
You can quote them on that.
Ah, it's a wonder your head still fits through the door.
translation.it: È un miracolo che la tua testa passi ancora dalla porta.

translation.en: [man] Fergus Suter, you and I are gonna make history.
translation.it: Fergus Suter, noi due passeremo alla storia.

translation.en: [station attendant] Darwen. This is Darwen.
-[train whistle blows] -Come on. Let's go.
[man] I've seen how you play in Scotland.
translation.it: Ti ho visto giocare in Scozia.

translation.en: Your passing game is the future of football.
translation.it: I tuoi passaggi sono il futuro del calcio.

translation.en: [man] Let's talk in my office.
So...
-How you both feeling? -Ready to get started.
translation.it: - come vi sentite? - Pronti per cominciare.

translation.en: So long as you keep your end of the bargain.
translation.it: Purché mantenga la sua parte dell'accordo.

translation.en: Food and board's all arranged, as agreed.
They're not gonna know what's hit 'em.
translation.it: Non hanno idea di cosa li aspetti.

translation.en: Who are the new lads, then?
No idea.
[man 1] Not from round here, that's for sure.
translation.it: Di sicuro, non sono della zona.

translation.en: They're not mill workers either.
[man 2] Why has Walsh gone and brought them here?
translation.it: Perché Walsh li ha portati qui?

translation.en: [man 3] Got our new jerseys, lads.
Finished 'em up last night.
[man 3] And youse, captain.
-There you go. -[man 4] Ready for the big game Saturday?
translation.it: - Ecco a te. - Pronti per sabato?

translation.en: And one for each of the new lads.
That's all there was, Mr. Walsh. I've only done 11.
translation.it: Sono finite, sig. Walsh. Ne ho fatte solo 11.

translation.en: Jones, Harris, you don't mind, do you?
translation.it: Jones, Harris, non vi dispiace, vero?

translation.en: I'd like to give Mr. Suter and Mr. Love a chance.
translation.it: Vorrei dare una possibilità al sig. Suter e al sig. Love.

translation.en: Fergus Suter...
and Jimmy Love?
Not the Fergus Suter and Jimmy Love who play for Partick?
translation.it: Fergus Suter e Jimmy Love, giocatori del Partick?

translation.en: They don't play for Partick anymore. They're Darwen players now.
translation.it: Non giocano più nel Partick. Ora giocano nel Darwen.

translation.en: Mr. Walsh, with respect, sir, Jones and Harris helped us get to the quarter-finals.
translation.it: Sig. Walsh, Jones e Harris ci hanno fatti arrivare ai quarti.

translation.en: And these two are going to help us win the damn thing. Now, this is my mill. My team.
translation.it: Questi due ci portano alla vittoria. Questa è la mia fabbrica, la mia squadra.

translation.en: [Walsh] Now, give 'em the jerseys.
[Walsh] Good lads.
All right.
I've put you in here.
This is nice.
[woman] Mr. Walsh was most particular. Which of you is Mr. Suter?
translation.it: Il sig. Walsh si è raccomandato tanto. Chi di voi è il sig. Suter?

translation.en: That's me.
That means you must be Mr. Love.
translation.it: Allora, lei dev'essere il sig. Love.

translation.en: Guilty as charged.
Does Mr. Platt work for Mr. Walsh?
translation.it: Il sig. Platt lavora per il sig. Walsh?

translation.en: Uh, he used to. I'm a widow.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.
-Jimmy, for the love of God, no. -What?
translation.it: - Jimmy, per l'amor di Dio, no. - Che c'è?

translation.en: [Fergus] Keep your mind on the game.
Did you know there were 43 teams in the Cup this year?
And Arthur's is one of the last eight left in.
translation.it: E quella di Arthur è una delle ultime otto rimaste.

translation.en: Isn't that splendid?
We're playing a mill team in the quarter-finals this Saturday, Papa.
translation.it: Giochiamo contro gli operai ai quarti di finale sabato, papà.

translation.en: Really?
The quarter-finals?
Do the millhands often get that far?
[Arthur] No, not usually.
[Lord Kinnaird] Will you go on with this once your child arrives?
translation.it: Continuerai a giocare quando nascerà tuo figlio?

translation.en: I hadn't given it much thought.
Did you play much sport, Papa?
translation.it: Lei hai fatto tanto sport, papà?

translation.en: I shot, of course.
I never hunted.
-I'm not against it-- -But you are against football?
translation.it: - Non sono contrario. - Però, al calcio sì?

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no.
I think it a healthy way for little boys to get fit.
translation.it: Trovo sia un modo sano per tenere in forma i bambini.

translation.en: [station attendant] All aboard!
All passengers!
Train's about to depart!
All aboard, please!
[Walsh] Only gentlemen have lifted the Cup.
translation.it: Solo gli aristocratici hanno vinto la coppa.

translation.en: Men from fine schools, with fine clothes, fine lives.
translation.it: Frequentatori di scuole prestigiose, con dei bei vestiti, una bella vita.

translation.en: Imagine what it would mean to see men like us lift it.
translation.it: Immagina se la vincessero persone come noi.

translation.en: That's the dream.
[Walsh] Well, I want to wake up and find it's more than a dream.
translation.it: Voglio svegliarmi e scoprire che non è solo un sogno.

translation.en: To find out it's happened.
See, that's the reason I brought you to Darwen, Fergus.
translation.it: Perciò, ti ho portato a Darwen, Fergus.

translation.en: [Walsh] Wait here, lads.
[Darwen player] Stop, lads. Hold up.
What do you make of this, lads?
You'd think the Queen lived here.
Boys.
-[Darwen player] Look at these lads! -Gentlemen.
[Arthur] Welcome.
I'm, uh... I'm captain of the Old Etonians.
translation.it: Sono il capitano degli Old Etonians.

translation.en: -You're Arthur Kinnaird? -That's right.
I saw you play at Hampden a few years back against Queen's Park. Mm-hmm.
translation.it: Ti ho visto giocare a Hampden anni fa contro Queen's Park.

translation.en: [stammers] You were good.
Well, that's high praise indeed.
Of course, the game's changed since your heyday.
translation.it: Il gioco è cambiato dal tuo periodo d'oro.

translation.en: I mean, it has in Scotland, at least.
Must be hard moving with the times.
translation.it: Sarà dura stare al passo con i tempi.

translation.en: Well, now we've established that my best days are in the past,
translation.it: Ora che abbiamo stabilito che il mio periodo migliore è passato,

translation.en: perhaps we should get moving.
-I never meant-- -What's your name?
The Suter who plays for Hibernian?
Well, I used to, at any rate.
Now I play for Darwen.
It's hardly a... hardly a local team for you.
translation.it: Non è esattamente la tua squadra locale.

translation.en: Jimmy and I wanted a change of scene.
translation.it: Io e Jimmy volevamo cambiare aria.

translation.en: -Jimmy? -Jimmy Love.
-He made the trip down, too. -Did he indeed?
translation.it: - È venuto giù anche lui. - Davvero?

translation.en: Uh, everyone, these boys will show you to your changing rooms.
translation.it: Questi bambini vi accompagneranno agli spogliatoi.

translation.en: [Darwen player] Hurry up, lads. Suit up and boot up.
I've been through our Football Association records,
translation.it: Ho esaminato i registri della federazione calcistica.

translation.en: and neither Fergus Suter nor Jimmy Love played for them in the previous rounds.
translation.it: Né Suter né Love hanno giocato per loro nei gironi precedenti.

translation.en: There's nothing in the rules that say they can't switch team members.
translation.it: Il regolamento consente di cambiare giocatori.

translation.en: True, but why would two successful Scottish players
translation.it: Vero, ma perché due giocatori affermati dovrebbero lasciare Glasgow

translation.en: leave Glasgow to join a tinpot mill team in Darwen?
translation.it: Vero, ma perché due giocatori affermati dovrebbero lasciare Glasgow per una squadra da quattro soldi?

translation.en: Clearly, they're being paid.
To play football? But that's against the rules.
translation.it: Per giocare a calcio? Ma è contro il regolamento.

translation.en: Surely, no one would risk suspension from the Cup?
translation.it: Nessuno rischierebbe la squalifica dal campionato.

translation.en: It would explain why two players would travel from Scotland
translation.it: Spiega perché due lasciano la Scozia

translation.en: to join a team they have no connection with.
translation.it: per una squadra con cui non c'entrano niente.

translation.en: -Now, how do we prove it? -[Arthur] We don't need to.
translation.it: - Come lo dimostriamo? - Non ce n'è bisogno.

translation.en: We'll beat them today,
and they'll be knocked out the competition.
translation.it: e li buttiamo fuori dalla gara.

translation.en: -Are we right, lads? -[players] Aye.
[Walsh] Now, remember, they're a rough team.
They'll play as a pack and try to run through you.
translation.it: Giocheranno compatti e cercheranno di bucare la difesa.

translation.en: -[player 1] Let's go then, boys. -[player 2] Come on. Stick together.
When we get out, I lead from the front.
-Come on. -[Jimmy] Fergie!
You coming?
[woman] What's all this to-do about?
Playing in the quarter-finals of the FA Cup.
-Really? -Yeah. Just waiting on news from the match.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì, aspettiamo notizie della partita.

translation.en: Well, I've made it, Mr. Suter,
even if my glory days are behind me.
translation.it: anche se i miei giorni di gloria sono finiti.

translation.en: Right. Let's knock these posh bastards off the perch.
translation.it: Dai, facciamo scendere dal piedistallo questi snob.

translation.en: Right. Go on, lads. Let's go.
Is that it?
I suppose he's the captain, Fergus.
Stay tight.
Yep.
[Etonian player] Come on, boys. Send them back.
[Fergus] Play the ball.
[Darwen player] Come on! In tight!
-[Arthur] Take him! -[Fergus grunts]
[Darwen player] Come on now!
Game doesn't seem to have changed so very much, Mr. Suter.
translation.it: Il gioco non sembra essere cambiato poi tanto, sig. Suter.

translation.en: [Darwen player] Come on. Come on, boys.
[man] The Old Etonians have scored again!
translation.it: Un altro gol per gli Old Etonians!

translation.en: -[Darwen player] There we go! -Yes!
-We got one back! -[crowd cheers]
-It's three-one! -Yes!
-[whistle blows] -[referee] Half-time!
[referee] Half-time, gentlemen.
That Kinnaird is a bloody hard man to get around.
We need to fight fire with fire.
They shove you, you shove 'em back. They hit you, you hit 'em back.
translation.it: Se spingono, spingete anche voi. Se vi urtano, urtateli anche voi.

translation.en: -You can't win playing at their own game. -So, what do you suggest we do instead?
translation.it: - Non vinciamo facendo il loro gioco. - Secondo te, cosa dovremmo fare?

translation.en: [Etonian] At this rate, I'm gonna be coming out.
translation.it: Di questo passo, verrò fuori io.

translation.en: I want five more goals this half, so we have something to celebrate at dinner.
translation.it: Datemi altri cinque gol, così avremo qualcosa da festeggiare.

translation.en: [all] Yes!
What makes you such an expert?
I'm telling you how we play in Scotland, that's all.
translation.it: Ti sto solo dicendo come si gioca in Scozia.

translation.en: Would you listen to him?
But Marshall's the captain.
Well, Suter's the captain now.
Lads, football is not complicated.
translation.it: Ragazzi, il calcio non è complicato.

translation.en: We don't always have to run the ball forward.
translation.it: Non dobbiamo sempre mandare la palla avanti.

translation.en: I'll stay behind, and I'll play it back.
translation.it: Io resterò dietro e giocherò da dietro.

translation.en: Jimmy, you know what you're doing, right?
translation.it: Jimmy, tu sai quello che fai, giusto?

translation.en: Tommy, this game is about space.
translation.it: Tommy, in questo gioco conta lo spazio.

translation.en: I want you to go out wide on the left.
translation.it: Devi andare tutto a sinistra. Sei il più veloce in campo.

translation.en: You're the fastest man on the pitch. You're not getting a chance to show it.
translation.it: Devi andare tutto a sinistra. Sei il più veloce in campo. Non lo stai dimostrando. Lascia che la palla faccia il suo lavoro.

translation.en: [Fergus] Let the ball do the work.
translation.it: Non lo stai dimostrando. Lascia che la palla faccia il suo lavoro.

translation.en: We pass, we move, we pass again.
translation.it: Passiamo, ci muoviamo, passiamo di nuovo.

translation.en: Space.
But that's not how we play.
Wider. Right out onto the touchline.
translation.it: Di più. Fino alla linea laterale.

translation.en: Spread out.
-They've moved their formation. -Isn't that better?
translation.it: - Hanno spostato la formazione. - Meglio, no?

translation.en: We'll run right through them.
-Come on, boys! I want the same again. -[whistle blows]
-[Arthur] Same again! -Here we go, Darwen.
Yes!
[player] Get it over to him! Yeah!
It's five-four!
The ball's gone before you can put a tackle in.
translation.it: La palla sparisce prima che tu faccia un tackle.

translation.en: Just do whatever it takes.
Come on! Come on!
[woman] It's five-five!
[referee] It's full-time, gentlemen.
-[thunder rumbling] -[referee] Full-time, thank you.
We'll take a few minutes to get fresh air into our lungs and then extra time.
translation.it: Qualche minuto per una boccata d'aria e poi i tempi supplementari.

translation.en: Look, no extra time was agreed before the game.
translation.it: Non abbiamo stabilito i supplementari prima della partita.

translation.en: Since when was that a rule?
translation.it: Da quando in qua è una regola?

translation.en: It's not in Scotland.
It is here.
Come on, boys.
[Etonian player] I'm glad that's finished. That was more tiring than I expected.
translation.it: Meno male che è finita. È stato più faticoso del previsto.

translation.en: He said no to extra time.
translation.it: Ha detto di no ai supplementari.

translation.en: What's all this about? Why are we not playing extra time?
translation.it: Cos'è questa storia? Perché non facciamo i supplementari?

translation.en: [Fergus] Because he knows they're beaten.
It'll be replayed next Saturday.
These men have been up since before dawn and traveled for hours.
translation.it: Sono svegli dall'alba, hanno viaggiato per ore.

translation.en: You expect them to do it all again?
translation.it: Vuoi che facciano tutto da capo?

translation.en: We're here now. Let's finish it now.
Look, we can refer this to the president of the Football Association, if you prefer.
translation.it: Possiamo rivolgerci al presidente della federazione, se preferite.

translation.en: -Well, how long will that take? -Not too long.
translation.it: - E quanto ci vorrà? - Non molto.

translation.en: He's the president of the FA? He's your bloody goalkeeper.
translation.it: È lui il presidente? Il vostro portiere di merda?

translation.en: We're all on the board of the Football Association. Do you have a problem with that?
translation.it: Siamo tutti nella commissione. Hai qualche problema?

translation.en: Don't you?
I'm afraid extra time wasn't agreed, gentlemen.
translation.it: I tempi supplementari non erano previsti.

translation.en: Those are the rules.
And rules are made to be adhered to. [Fergus] We had you beaten today.
translation.it: - Le regole vanno rispettate. - Vi avevamo battuto oggi.

translation.en: You know we did.
If you are right,
then you'll beat us again...
next Saturday.
No, I just worry one day Arthur will come home with a broken leg.
translation.it: Ho paura che un giorno Arthur torni a casa con una gamba rotta.

translation.en: Well, if he does, you can be sure it won't be his own.
translation.it: Beh, in quel caso, non sarà la sua.

translation.en: -[Alma laughs] -What am I missing up there?
Oh, Monkey's telling me about the game.
translation.it: Monkey mi sta raccontando del gioco.

translation.en: Ah, Arthur's returning the favor at this end of the table.
translation.it: Arthur sta restituendo il favore qui.

translation.en: Have you told her how it ended?
[sighs] There's nothing to tell.
Well, now I'm intrigued.
[chuckles] Uh, it's not really my story.
translation.it: Non è storia che fa per me.

translation.en: How strange. Usually, I can't stop you talking about football.
translation.it: Strano. Di solito, non fai che parlare di calcio.

translation.en: Or cricket. Or rugby, for that matter.
translation.it: O di cricket. O di rugby, se è per questo.

translation.en: When it was a draw, Arthur wouldn't allow them extra time to settle it.
translation.it: Hanno pareggiato e Arthur non ha concesso i supplementari.

translation.en: So they must come back next week. All the way from Lancashire?
translation.it: - Devono tornare la settimana prossima. - Dal Lancashire?

translation.en: In all the years we've been married, I believe this is the first time you've ever asked me a single question about football.
translation.it: In tanti anni di matrimonio, è la prima volta che mi chiedi del calcio.

translation.en: But is it true, Arthur?
We had to do what was right.
translation.it: Era la cosa giusta da fare.

translation.en: It seems rather unkind.
-Can I second that? -[Marindin] We must follow the rules.
translation.it: - Mi associo. - Bisogna seguire le regole.

translation.en: -Or why do we have them? -Absolutely.
translation.it: - Che ce le abbiamo a fare? - Assolutamente.

translation.en: And if you'd agreed extra time, Darwen would've beaten you.
translation.it: Se avessi concesso i supplementari, il Darwen avrebbe vinto.

translation.en: [chuckles] Don't be absurd.
Sorry, old boy, but I must agree.
translation.it: Scusa, vecchio mio, ma sono d'accordo.

translation.en: Another ten minutes and you would've been out of the Cup on your ear.
translation.it: Altri dieci minuti e vi avrebbero sbattuti fuori dal campionato.

translation.en: Are you suggesting I acted in an underhand manner?
translation.it: Stai insinuando che abbia agito in modo subdolo?

translation.en: Well, I think "underhand" is a bit strong. Shall we say, uh, the rules were very convenient.
translation.it: "Subdolo" è una parola forte. Diciamo che le regole ti hanno fatto comodo.

translation.en: Do you really think we would've been beaten by a gaggle of--
translation.it: Secondo te, ci facevamo battere da un branco di...

translation.en: Of what? Mill workers?
No. Professionals.
Darwen team are fielding professional players.
Paying two members of their team to play.
translation.it: Pagare due giocatori per giocare e...

translation.en: But what's wrong with that?
This is a game for amateurs and gentlemen.
translation.it: Si tratta di un gioco per dilettanti e gentiluomini.

translation.en: It's our game. [laughs] Your game?
translation.it: - È il nostro gioco. - Il vostro gioco?

translation.en: -We invented it. -[Alma] Who's "we"?
The Old Etonians? [Arthur] Yes! As a matter of fact.
translation.it: - Gli Old Etonians? - Sì, è un dato di fatto.

translation.en: Eton, Charterhouse, Harrow. Lots of schools played a part,
translation.it: Eton, Charterhouse, Harrow, tante scuole hanno contribuito,

translation.en: but the point is we took a raggle-taggle pastime...
translation.it: ma noi abbiamo preso un passatempo che era un accozzaglia...

translation.en: with different rules wherever it was played,
translation.it: di regole diverse a seconda del posto

translation.en: and we turned it into a proper game.
translation.it: e ne abbiamo fatto un gioco vero e proprio.

translation.en: For gentlemen.
Heavens. Do gentlemen shout?
translation.it: Cielo, i gentiluomini alzano la voce?

translation.en: Ladies...
I'm catching your eye.
Shall we leave the men to their port?
translation.it: Vogliamo lasciare gli uomini tra di loro?

translation.en: Well, shall we talk about something a little less contentious?
translation.it: Bene. Vogliamo parlare di qualcosa di meno controverso?

translation.en: What? Like the Russian-Turkish War?
I feel like a fraud.
We're celebrating like we won. We didn't win, did we?
translation.it: Festeggiamo come se avessimo vinto. Non abbiamo vinto, però.

translation.en: We came nearer to winning than we ever have done before. And we may yet do it Saturday.
translation.it: Ci siamo andati vicini più che mai e potremmo ancora vincere sabato.

translation.en: Look around.
You've given these people something to believe in.
translation.it: Hai dato a questa gente qualcosa in cui credere.

translation.en: The game feeds the soul
translation.it: Il gioco è nutrimento per l'anima

translation.en: when they have nothing else that does it in their life.
I'm gonna head back.
-Come on, it's just getting started. -Jimmy, here.
translation.it: - Dai, siamo appena all'inizio. - Aspetta, tieni.

translation.en: Don't drink too much.
Fergie, come on, pal. Look, what's one more beer?
translation.it: Fergie, dai, amico. Un'altra birra che sarà mai?

translation.en: Come on.
Well, I suppose I am allowed an opinion.
Not on things you don't understand.
translation.it: Non su cose che non capisci.

translation.en: I think I understand perfectly.
You're afraid of them, aren't you?
Afraid?
You're afraid new teams like Darwen will take over your game.
translation.it: Che nuove squadre come il Darwen si prendano il vostro gioco.

translation.en: You and Alfred and all the others.
translation.it: Tu, Alfred e tutti gli altri.

translation.en: You're scared you'll lose control of it.
translation.it: Avete paura che ve lo portino via.

translation.en: That's ridiculous.
Is it?
Arthur, you're a decent man, but this game brings out the worst in you.
translation.it: Sei una persona perbene, ma il calcio tira fuori il peggio di te.

translation.en: Makes you childish and defensive and petulant.
translation.it: Diventi infantile, stai sulla difensiva, sei irascibile.

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry if I disappoint you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace se sono una delusione.

translation.en: What?
I want us to be good parents...
and to set a good example for our child.
translation.it: che diamo il buon esempio a nostro figlio.

translation.en: We will be.
Of course we will be. Why wouldn't we be?
I'm Fergus... Suter.
Oh, I know who you are.
People won't stop shouting your name.
translation.it: La gente non fa che gridare il tuo nome.

translation.en: I'm Martha Almond.
You should've sung in the pub tonight.
translation.it: Avresti dovuto cantare al pub stasera.

translation.en: I should get going.
I could...
I could walk you home, if you like.
translation.it: accompagnarti a casa, se ti va.

translation.en: See, it's like this.
I have a little girl. She's two years old.
translation.it: Ho una bambina. Ha due anni.

translation.en: She has no dad.
He's gone, but... I was never married to him in the first place.
translation.it: Se n'è andato, ma non siamo mai stati sposati.

translation.en: Do you still want to walk me home?
Sure.
Why not?
We got off on the wrong foot. Let me buy you another.
translation.it: Siamo partiti col piede sbagliato. Te ne offro un altro.

translation.en: I shouldn't.
But go on, then.
I'm buying, though. No arguments.
translation.it: Pago io, però, non voglio discutere.

translation.en: So what did Walsh offer to get you all the way down from Glasgow?
translation.it: Allora, cosa vi ha offerto Walsh per farvi venire giù da Glasgow?

translation.en: [man] Oh, my head!
Feels good to have a man in the house again.
translation.it: È bello avere di nuovo un uomo in casa.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind me saying, but...
translation.it: Spero non ti dispiaccia se te lo dico, ma...

translation.en: you've got a lovely smile.
-Sorry, I don't mean to embarrass you. -No, you didn't.
translation.it: - Scusa, non voglio metterti in imbarazzo. - Nessun imbarazzo.

translation.en: What's coming next, I wonder?
How about this?
We best get going.
Aye, we should.
-Thanks for that. -Ah, pleasure.
Oh, won't you have some breakfast?
Oh, just a piece of bread.
Gentlemen,
the situation is no longer tenable.
Our mills are struggling to turn a profit,
translation.it: Le fabbriche fanno fatica a realizzare utili

translation.en: and the banks are starting to call in their loans.
translation.it: e le banche cominciano a chiedere il saldo dei prestiti.

translation.en: It is regrettable that the only course of action
translation.it: È increscioso che l'unica strada che vedo per proteggere l'azienda

translation.en: I can see to protect our business is a wage cut.
translation.it: È increscioso che l'unica strada che vedo per proteggere l'azienda sia un taglio dei salari.

translation.en: As chairman of the guild, I must insist that we present a united front on this matter.
translation.it: In qualità di presidente, insisto perché facciamo fronte comune.

translation.en: To do otherwise would only invite trouble.
I propose a five-percent wage cut for every worker.
translation.it: Propongo un taglio salariale del cinque percento per ogni operaio.

translation.en: -All those in favor. -[all] Aye!
All those against?
Nay.
Most of my workers have families. They can barely get by as it is.
translation.it: La maggior parte dei miei ha una famiglia. Fanno già fatica a tirare avanti così.

translation.en: James, you know I don't like it,
translation.it: James, sai che non mi fa piacere,

translation.en: but the alternative is that the mills go out of business.
translation.it: ma l'alternativa è che le fabbriche falliscano.

translation.en: [man] How will they get by then?
How many workers do you employ at your mill, Mr. Walsh?
translation.it: Quanti operai lavorano presso la sua fabbrica, sig. Walsh?

translation.en: A couple of hundred?
A hundred and seventy-seven.
Across my mills, I have 3,000.
Two thousand.
Two-and-a-half.
[chairman] The motion is passed.
Every member of the Cotton Masters' Guild will impose the same cut in wages.
translation.it: Tutti i membri della Cotton Masters' Guild imporranno lo stesso taglio salariale.

translation.en: Do you ever worry...
about whether you'd make a good father?
translation.it: se sei stato un buon padre?

translation.en: Not really.
I suppose I assumed...
that it would be just as it had been for my father.
translation.it: che sarebbe andata esattamente come per mio padre.

translation.en: And for his father before him.
translation.it: E per suo padre prima di lui.

translation.en: I don't remember seeing much of you when I was young.
translation.it: Non ricordo che fossi tanto presente quando ero piccolo.

translation.en: Don't be silly.
You were brought down every evening.
translation.it: Ti portavano giù tutte le sere.

translation.en: I was brought down every tea time.
translation.it: Mi portavano giù per l'ora del tè.

translation.en: Or after tea, if Mama had guests, but I don't remember your being there often.
translation.it: O dopo il tè, se mamma aveva ospiti, ma non ricordo di averti visto spesso.

translation.en: I was here.
You came and saw me sometimes when I was already in bed.
translation.it: Venivi da me a volte quando ero già a letto.

translation.en: But not much.
All over this country...
all over the world,
there are children with no food and no shelter.
translation.it: ci sono bambini che non hanno da mangiare né una casa.

translation.en: You really cannot expect me to feel much sympathy
translation.it: Non puoi aspettarti che provi tanta compassione

translation.en: for the childhood that you enjoyed.
translation.it: per l'infanzia che hai avuto tu.

translation.en: So, there's nothing you would have done differently?
translation.it: Quindi, non avresti fatto niente di diverso?

translation.en: Don't over-complicate it.
Your role is to provide.
translation.it: Il tuo ruolo è quello di mantenere la famiglia.

translation.en: To be the man of the house.
[Alma] Don't tell me you've quarreled again.
translation.it: Non dirmi che avete litigato di nuovo.

translation.en: We were discussing fatherhood...
as it happens.
Oh, you surprise me. [chuckles]
You wouldn't be surprised if you heard what he said.
translation.it: Non ti sorprenderesti se avessi sentito cosa ha detto.

translation.en: And you'll be happy to hear that I want to know my children better than he did.
translation.it: Sappi che voglio conoscere i miei figli meglio di quanto abbia fatto lui.

translation.en: I am happy.
[Alma] I'm so looking forward to becoming a mother.
translation.it: Non vedo l'ora di diventare madre.

translation.en: -They've cut wages by five percent. -[woman 1] What?
translation.it: - Un taglio salariale del cinque percento. - Cosa?

translation.en: -And what's next, ten? Fifteen? -[woman 1] How will I feed my family?
translation.it: Dove arriveremo, a dieci? 15? - Come sfamerò la famiglia? - Appunto.

translation.en: -I know. -[woman 2] What?
-It's a wage cut, five percent. -[woman] They can't do that.
translation.it: - Un taglio del cinque percento. - Non lo possono fare.

translation.en: -The mill will reopen tomorrow. -[crowd clamors] Go and spend the day with your families.
translation.it: La fabbrica riaprirà domani. Trascorrete la giornata in famiglia.

translation.en: -What? Why? -[worker] You've already cut our wages.
translation.it: Che cosa? Perché? - Avete già tagliato lo stipendio. - Non importa perché. Sistemerò tutto.

translation.en: [Walsh] It don't matter why. I'll get it sorted.
translation.it: - Avete già tagliato lo stipendio. - Non importa perché. Sistemerò tutto.

translation.en: What about pay? We gonna get paid for today?
translation.it: E la paga? Ci pagherete per oggi?

translation.en: I can't pay you for days when the mill isn't working.
translation.it: Non posso pagare per i giorni di inattività.

translation.en: -[clamoring] -[Walsh] I'm sorry.
It'll all get straightened out by tomorrow.
Please, go home.
All members of Darwen Football Club, follow me.
translation.it: Tutti i giocatori del Darwen, seguitemi.

translation.en: The bank called in a loan.
translation.it: La banca ha richiesto il saldo del prestito.

translation.en: When I couldn't pay up immediately, they foreclosed on the mill.
translation.it: Non potendo saldare subito, hanno pignorato la fabbrica.

translation.en: Now, I can get the mill reopened tomorrow, but it'll take all the liquidity.
translation.it: Posso far riaprire la fabbrica, ma ci vorrà tutta la liquidità.

translation.en: What's this got to do with us?
The train tickets to take the team back down to London, I need that money.
translation.it: I biglietti del treno per portare la squadra a Londra. Mi servono i soldi.

translation.en: I need it to get the mill reopened and get the men back to work.
translation.it: Mi servono per riaprire la fabbrica e far riprendere il lavoro.

translation.en: We're gonna have to forfeit the match.
How much did you waste getting this pair in?
translation.it: Quanti soldi hai sprecato per questi due?

translation.en: [Tommy] He's paying 'em to play.
translation.it: - Che cosa? - Li paga per giocare.

translation.en: -He paid 'em to leave Partick. -Wait a minute.
-I saw the money you gave Jimmy. -[Walsh] That's none of your business.
translation.it: Ho visto che hai dato i soldi a Jimmy. - Non sono affari tuoi. - Ora siamo fuori dal campionato.

translation.en: Now we're out of the Cup 'cause you've given away our fares.
translation.it: - Non sono affari tuoi. - Ora siamo fuori dal campionato.

translation.en: You can have it back.
-Barely a quarter of what's needed. -Maybe not.
translation.it: - È un quarto di quello che serve. - Forse no.

translation.en: But whilst our wages were being cut, you were paying them to play football.
translation.it: Mentre ci tagliavano gli stipendi, tu li pagavi per giocare a calcio.

translation.en: And what would've happened if we were found out?
translation.it: Cosa sarebbe successo se ci avessero scoperti?

translation.en: We'd be banned from the Cup for God knows how many years!
translation.it: Ci avrebbero squalificati per chissà quanti anni!

translation.en: -[Walsh] Enough. -You cheated.
And you made the rest of us cheat without even knowing it.
translation.it: Hai fatto di noi degli imbroglioni inconsapevoli!

translation.en: I said that's enough!
So it's over?
I'm very sorry.
Come on.
We don't know that Mr. Walsh won't find the money somewhere.
translation.it: Magari il sig. Walsh troverà i soldi da qualche parte.

translation.en: We've given him all day. As it is, we'll be sleeping on the train.
translation.it: Gli abbiamo dato la giornata. A questo punto, dormiremo sul treno.

translation.en: But I--
I thought the OEs would beat us, and we would be sent home then, all right?
translation.it: Pensavo che ci avrebbero battuti e che ci avrebbero mandati a casa.

translation.en: With our tail between our legs.
translation.it: Con la coda tra le gambe.

translation.en: Don't pretend that you don't care about this place.
translation.it: Non fingere di fregartene di questo posto.

translation.en: I seen it last night when you realized how much this meant to these people.
translation.it: L'ho visto ieri quando hai capito quanto ci tiene questa gente.

translation.en: You care about them too.
I care about the money.
But we can't give up now! It's the FA Cup!
translation.it: - Non possiamo arrenderci! È la FA Cup! - È finita.

translation.en: It is finished, Jimmy.
translation.it: - Non possiamo arrenderci! È la FA Cup! - È finita. Jimmy.

translation.en: The mill's closed. We're not going south.
translation.it: La fabbrica ha chiuso. Non andremo a sud.

translation.en: And I can play football for nothing back home with my family.
translation.it: Posso giocare a calcio gratis a casa con la mia famiglia.

translation.en: Pack your things.
Stay.
I can't.
But you can.
I can't.
Fergie and I...
We've always been together.
He needs me. Stay till tomorrow at least.
translation.it: - Ha bisogno di me. - Resta fino a domani, almeno.

translation.en: You don't want to travel at night.
Are you coming or not? Give me a minute.
translation.it: - Vieni o no? - Dammi un minuto.

translation.en: I swear to God.
You need rid of that hat before we get back.
translation.it: Devi sbarazzarti di quel cappello prima di tornare.

translation.en: Folk'll have you down as a bloody Sassenach.
translation.it: Ti scambieranno per un maledetto inglese.

translation.en: I don't care what they have me down as.
translation.it: Non m'importa per cosa mi scambiano.

translation.en: -[panting] You've got to come quickly. -What is it?
You'll see. Come on.
Come with me, both of you.
translation.it: Venite con me. Tutti e due.

translation.en: This is our train.
We're going home.
[Fergus] I don't understand. [Doris] Word got out Darwen would be forfeiting.
translation.it: - Non capisco. - Hanno saputo che il Darwen dà forfait.

translation.en: The town won't have it. Tom Hindle came up with the idea.
translation.it: La città non ci sta. L'idea è venuta a Tom Hindle.

translation.en: We're selling subscriptions.
They can either pay weekly or all at once.
translation.it: Possono pagare settimanalmente o in un'unica soluzione.

translation.en: The point is, we're going to the rematch.
translation.it: Il punto è che vogliamo andare alla partita.

translation.en: -Don't those people need that money? -Maybe, but they need football too.
translation.it: - Questa gente non ha bisogno di soldi? - Forse, ma ha bisogno anche del calcio.

translation.en: -[woman] We're proud of you, lads. -[man] You're what Darwen's made of.
translation.it: - Siamo fieri di voi. - Siete l'anima di Darwen.

translation.en: [woman] Here you go.
You're short three players. The match is due to start in ten minutes.
translation.it: Vi mancano tre giocatori. La partita inizia tra dieci minuti.

translation.en: Well, I'm sure they won't be much longer.
You can use the dressing room if you'd like to be more comfortable.
translation.it: Potete usare lo spogliatoio, se volete stare più comodi.

translation.en: We'll be on the pitch.
If you don't have a team on time, you forfeit.
translation.it: Se non c'è una squadra, si rinuncia.

translation.en: [Walsh] Or you play with what you've got.
translation.it: Oppure si gioca con quello che si ha.

translation.en: You can't expect us to play when there's only eight of us.
translation.it: Non pretenderai che giochiamo con otto giocatori.

translation.en: To quote you, Mr. Kinnaird, "Rules are made to be adhered to."
translation.it: Come ha detto lei, sig. Kinnaird, le regole vanno rispettate.

translation.en: That is unless they happen not to suit you, of course.
translation.it: Sempre che facciano al caso suo, ovviamente.

translation.en: Ten minutes...
or we claim the win.
To whom will you claim the win?
To the FA committee?
The press.
Then everyone will see what good sports you gentlemen are.
translation.it: Così, tutti vedranno che siete dei gentiluomini leali.

translation.en: [scoffs] Who does he think he is?
If we don't have a full team, we ought to forfeit the game.
translation.it: Senza squadra al completo, bisogna dare forfait.

translation.en: What?
Why?
You heard him.
We're supposed to be gentlemen.
Two more minutes and the match is ours.
translation.it: Altri due minuti e la partita è nostra.

translation.en: They're here. All of them.
Whatever he's paying you, make sure you earn it.
translation.it: Qualunque cifra ti paghi, cerca di guadagnartela.

translation.en: We had them beat before.
We can do it again.
Where the hell have you been? You almost cost us the match.
translation.it: Che fine avete fatto? Per poco non perdevamo.

translation.en: Now, come here.
Now, we'll win this game, if we stop them playing their way.
translation.it: Vinceremo la partita, se gli impediremo di giocare a modo loro.

translation.en: Alfred, stay on Love. Don't give him any time on the ball.
translation.it: Alfred, resta su Love. Non fargli prendere la palla.

translation.en: -What about Suter? He's the real problem. -[Arthur] I'll stay on Suter.
translation.it: - E Suter? È lui il vero problema. - Resto io su Suter.

translation.en: You leave him to me.
-All right? -[Lyttelton] All right.
-[referee] Time. -[Lyttelton] All right, gents.
[referee] Gentlemen.
[Fergus] Jimmy!
[Fergus] Cross it, Jimmy!
[Alma] Did you see what Alfred did?
It didn't seem quite right.
Maybe not, but I'm afraid there'll be a great deal more of it.
translation.it: Forse no, ma temo che capiterà molto spesso.

translation.en: [Walsh] Foul! Referee!
-Forward! -[Arthur] As a pack!
-Get off me! -[grunts]
[Walsh] Come on, Suter!
[Fergus] Together! Together!
I thought you youngsters were meant to be quicker than us older folk.
translation.it: Pensavo che voi giovincelli foste più veloci di noi vecchietti.

translation.en: Hurry up! At the ball! Heads up! Heads up!
[referee] Full-time. Full-time.
That was a good game.
Did you even play?
Or did you just shadow me to stop me playing?
translation.it: O mi sei stato alle costole per impedirmi di giocare?

translation.en: There's no need to be a bad loser.
Kinnaird can have his Cup.
Next season, it'll be ours.
If you'll stay.
Do you want me to?
Tommy Marshall thinks I'm a waste of money.
translation.it: Marshall pensa che siano soldi sprecati.

translation.en: Well, he's wrong.
You're the only chance we've got of taking the Cup.
translation.it: Sei l'unica possibilità che abbiamo per vincere.

translation.en: Besides, people here, they love to watch you play.
translation.it: E poi la gente qui adora vederti giocare.

translation.en: It gives 'em hope
and pride and so much more.
You're valued here, Suter.
Come on, lads.
Let's go home.
Admit it, they won!
Can I just say, well done us.
translation.it: Posso dire che siamo stati bravi?

translation.en: Hear, hear!
Speech!
-Come on, Arthur, speech! -[man] Speech!
Come on.
I won't pretend I'm not jolly pleased the way things have turned out.
translation.it: Non farò finta di non essere contento per come sono andate le cose.

translation.en: [Arthur] To have beaten Darwen,
and to be once again in the semi-finals...
translation.it: ed essere di nuovo in semifinale...

translation.en: Excuse me.
I'm so sorry, I... I must leave you for a moment.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, devo lasciarvi un momento.

translation.en: -Shall I-- -[Alma] No, no, no. Please, sit.
translation.it: - Vuoi che... - No. Vi prego, sedetevi.

translation.en: Enjoy the rest of dinner.
And-- And well done.
All of you.
Very well done.
Excuse me.
Please.
Have they gone?
They have, at last. [chuckles]
Ada had to put Monkey in a fireman's lock before she could get him out.
translation.it: Ada ha dovuto attaccare Monkey per farlo uscire.

translation.en: How are you feeling? Hmm?
You any better?
[sighs] No, not much better, to be honest.
No... No...
No! [whimpers]
-[Arthur] Can anybody hear me?! -No!
Somebody send for a doctor!
[Walsh] Now, we might've lost...
but the town's still proud of you.
translation.it: ma la città è fiera di voi.

translation.en: Here's the man of the hour, Fergus Suter!
translation.it: Ecco l'uomo del momento, Fergus Suter!
